title: How many games before i get my lone wolf dynamic preference emblem?
body:
so i usually wait til end of season to grind ranked, i prefer the more chill atmosphere in norms

I've been playing a lot of ranked lately and was wondering why i havent gotten an emblem yet?
played well over 20 games, does it first update on patches?

replies.body: I believe your icon will be calculation on your 25 most recent games.  Check out our [Ranked Emblem](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems) guide for specific calculations to determine your icon.  Hope that helps!
It only counts **wins**, not just games.
